name: A Brazil World Soccer Football Run 2014: Road to Rio Finals - Win the Cup!
name_original: A Brazil World Soccer Football Run 2014: Road to Rio Finals - Win the Cup!
description:
Run, Jump and Rush on the road to Rio De Janeiro.

Escape the cops Soccer Dude!
Use your cool soccer skills to survive.

> RUN, JUMP and DUCK to escape - don't get busted
> Avoid TRAPS like barbed wire, fallen trees and rocks
> Awesome POWER-UPS to help you
> Unlock more characters
> Real time multiplayer

FEATURES:

> Real time multiplayer races
> Amazing 3D graphics
> Thrilling gameplay
> Easy, intuitive controls
> Loads of achievements to unlock

Download NOW 100% FREE!
